text: Dijon Football Côte d'Or (French pronunciation: [diʒɔ̃ futbol kot dɔʁ]; commonly referred to as Dijon FCO or simply Dijon) is a French association football club based in Dijon. During the 2016–17 campaign they will be competing in the following competitions: Ligue 1, Coupe de France, Coupe de la Ligue. == Competitions == == Ligue 1 == === Results summary === === Results by matchday === == Matches == ==External links== Dijon Category:Dijon FCO seasons
title: 2016–17 Dijon FCO season
